name: Mistral Large
description: Top-tier reasoning for high-complexity tasks and sophisticated problems.
comments: Mistral's flagship model with strongest overall capabilities. Currently points to mistral-large-2411.

name: Pixtral Large
description: Vision-capable large model with frontier reasoning capabilities.
comments: Vision-enabled model for multimodal tasks. Currently points to pixtral-large-2411.

name: Mistral Small
description: Mistral Small is optimized for high throughput and efficiency. Offers good performance for simpler tasks at a very competitive price point, making it suitable for cost-sensitive applications.
comments: Excellent price-performance ratio for everyday tasks. Currently points to mistral-small-2503.

name: Mistral Medium
description: Mistral Medium balances performance and cost efficiency. Designed for general-purpose applications requiring strong reasoning and text generation with good overall quality.
comments: Well-balanced model for most production use cases.

name: Mistral Saba
description: Custom-trained model to serve specific geographies, markets, and customers.
comments: Specialized model for specific use cases. Currently points to mistral-saba-2502.

name: Codestral
description: State-of-the-art Mistral model trained specifically for code tasks.
comments: Code-specialized model with superior programming capabilities. Currently points to codestral-2501.

name: Ministral 8B
description: Powerful model for on-device use cases.
comments: Efficient model suitable for edge deployment. Currently points to ministral-8b-2410.

name: Ministral 3B
comments: Ultra-efficient model for resource-constrained environments. Currently points to ministral-3b-2410.

name: Mistral Embed
description: State-of-the-art semantic for extracting representation of text extracts.
comments: Efficient embedding model for semantic search and retrieval applications.

name: Mistral OCR
description: Specialized model for optical character recognition and document processing.
comments: OCR-specialized model for document processing. Currently points to mistral-ocr-2503.

name: Mistral Moderation
description: Specialized model for content moderation and safety filtering.
comments: Content moderation model for detecting harmful content. Currently points to mistral-moderation-2411.

name: Open Mistral NeMo
description: Open-weight model with enhanced capabilities via NVIDIA NeMo framework.
comments: Optimized open-weight model. Currently points to open-mistral-nemo-2407.
